releaseNotes:
## What's New in v1.2.0

### Features
- Enhanced voice transcription accuracy
- Improved calendar integration
- Better privacy controls
- Performance optimizations

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed audio processing issues
- Resolved calendar sync problems
- Improved error handling

### Technical Improvements
- Updated dependencies
- Enhanced security measures
- Better cross-platform compatibility

stats.description: Smart voice transcription and calendar management desktop application with privacy-first approach
